Class GameConstants

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.util.GameConstants
public final class GameConstants extends Object
Centralized constants for the game application. Contains window dimensions, game mode targets, volume settings, and other configuration values.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    ARC_SIZE
    Arc size for rounded rectangles.

    BASE_COMBO_RATE
    Base playback rate for sound effects.

    Border offset in pixels.

    Brick size in pixels for main game board.

    CELL_GAP
    Gap between cells in pixels.

    Rate increment per combo level for sound effects.

    MAX_COMBO_RATE
    Maximum playback rate for combo sound effects.
    static final double
    MAX_VOLUME
    Maximum volume value (1.0 = 100%).

    Minimum volume value (0.0 = 0%).

    Panel X offset in pixels.

    static final int

    Target number of lines to clear in Puzzle mode.

    VOLUME_STEP
    Volume adjustment step size.
    static final int
    WINDOW_HEIGHT
    Window height in pixels.
    static final int
    WINDOW_WIDTH
    Window width in pixels.
